key.name: monitors
key.description: List of detected monitors as JSON strings with fields: id, model, serial.

key.name: positions
key.description: A mapping from a monitor key to a position string. Keys are derived as 'sn:SERIAL' when available, otherwise 'model:MODEL|id:ID'. Values are lowercase strings like 'left', 'center' (or 'centre'), or 'right'. Unknown/cleared positions should be removed from the mapping.
